start.text: You mortals enjoy your bloodshed too much.

start_boss.text: This seems mildly concerning to engage directly.

retreat.text: One less combat subroutine to keep running, at least.

out_of_missiles.text: Vessel has run out of missiles.
Missile autoforges should be standard issue, alas they are not.
Missile racks depleted on this one.

engaged.text: Rudimentary creatures of blood and flesh, please perish.
This is quite fun at times.
Death comes for all, except for me.
I am the vanguard of your destruction.
You should be grateful you get to see this side of me.
Combat subroutines are reporting fun ahead.
Combat always turns me into a sociopath. Loving it!

need_help.text: Sure glad I'm not actually on this ship!

pursuing.text: Fuck you in particular, as they say.
You will end, because I demand it.

hull_90.text: How was that quote? Ah yes, 'tis but a scratch.

hull_50.text: Sure love not having to pay for these repairs.
Still got about half a ship, at least.

hull_30.text: Would recommend giving me the retreat order here.
Damage levels getting a bit concerning now.
Might wanna retreat this one soon.
Good thing I'm not actually on this ship.
Making maximum use of available hull integrity.
Disabling damage alarms. Too much noise.

overload.text: Floating point error on the flux calculation there.
Is it true that overloads give you mortals a tingling sensation?
Taking externally imposed break from firing.
This flux grid is almost as weak as your flesh.

victory.text: Did my combat persona actually broadcast this?
I told you I'm not a combat AI, remember?
Why'd I sign up for this...
